home.slideshow_p1: Picture of the ceremony on the 22 October 2018
home.paragraph_1: With a total number of three groups on three different days, the Eco-Club meets weekly to discuss new topics, make experiments or to start new projects, all of this relating to make this school more environmentally friendly. This website is there to give you an insight into our current and future work.
home.paragraph_2: Our goal is to be a climate-neutral school. For our work, we have already received the second star of the 'Umweltschulen in Europa' project, while our goal is to receive the third star.
home.paragraph_3: 'Umweltschulen in Europa' is an award for which bavarian schools can apply. To receive it for one year, they have to fulfill multiple criteria, including two projects about the topics of environment and sustainability.
